result.execSummary:
Michael Anthony Potter was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Michael Anthony Potter was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Anthony Potter

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: signed by SRN & Def. this date. eif
Bail/bond hearing on September 5, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Sharon Ann Correll,  DF ATTY:  John A. Kucinski, DF:  Michael Anthony Potter appeared from jail. Address confirmed.  Court questions Defendant - he waives extradition to Minnesota.  SRN and Defendant sign Waiver of Extradition. Defendant to be held without bond pending pick up. Defendant has a plea hearing scheduled 9/9/14 @ 9 am w/SRN on other cases.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 5, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
